title: The Intern, Volume 2
description: My cock noticed her before I did.She came out of nowhere.Completely unexpected.And I let her in…unwillingly.But she gave me no choice.She sledgehammered my thick walls, leaving me charmed by her knowledge, and seduced by her beauty.I was captivated.And now…it was about to tumble down in a tsunami of lies. Uncertainty riveted my core as my anger spread…she was impossible to forget. After all, she was still my intern.Forbidden.Lust.Betrayal.I felt all of those things for her at once. But only one would destroy us.
author: Brooke Cumberland
